nodes.text: The Nightbrother village was a village populated by the Nightbrothers during the Clone Wars. It was located on the far side of the planet Dathomir.

In 21 BBY, after being betrayed by her Sith master Count Dooku, Asajj Ventress visited the village in search for both a new assassin for Dooku and someone to be used for assassinating the Count himself. After merciless tests, she selected a young Zabrak named Savage Opress.

Several days later, while searching for the source of Dooku's new assassin that left havoc on Devaron during the Battle for Temple of Eedit, the village was visited by Jedi Knights Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi.
